OptionsHeading.description: The heading displayed above the options on the management panel.

OptionActiveDescription.message: Disabling this turns off all filtering functionality

OptionPlaceholdersDescription.message: Show placeholders in place of filtered content (disable to hide filtered content completely)

OptionPageActionPopupMenuDescription.message: Enable the popup menu on the icon in the address bar (disable this to open the management panel directly when clicking the icon)

OptionManagementPanelTypeDescription.message: Specifies where/how the main mangement panel is displayed

OptionManagementPanelTypeValueModal.description: The label for the value of the Mangement Panel Type option that corresponds to using an embedded modal.

OptionManagementPanelTypeValueTab.message: Open in a new tab in the current window
OptionManagementPanelTypeValueTab.description: The label for the value of the Mangement Panel Type option that corresponds to using a new browser tab.

OptionManagementPanelTypeValueWindow.message: Open in a a new popup window
OptionManagementPanelTypeValueWindow.description: The label for the value of the Mangement Panel Type option that corresponds to using a new browser window.

OptionPrivateStorageDescription.message: This option determines if filters that are created in normal browsing mode are available while in Private/Incognito mode.

OptionPrivateStorageValueRead.message: Yes, but do NOT save changes

OptionUpdateError.message: An error occured while updating the $OPTION$ option: $ERROR$
OptionUpdateError.description: The error message displayed if an option fails to update correctly.
